paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Reputable Firm
detailsData.content: Experienced employment law firm in downtown San Francisco.

detailsData.title: Personal Attention
detailsData.content: Dedicated to providing personal attention to clients.

address: 57 Post Street, Suite 801, San Francisco, CA 94104
subHeading: Employment attorneys in San Francisco protecting employees from discrimination, harassment, and wrongful discharge
valueProp: Minnis & Smallets LLP is a reputable, experienced employment law firm in downtown San Francisco, serving all of the Bay Area. Personal attention is what sets us apart, according to our many satisfied clients.

testimonalData.text: Aaron Minnis is superb! He is the most professional, educated and knowledgeable lawyer with whom I have worked.
testimonalData.author: Tony S.

testimonalData.text: Sonya was terrific! As we discussed a challenging retroactive employment issue, she approached the conversation with a level of empathy, curiosity, and intelligence.
testimonalData.author: Dave O.

testimonalData.text: Veronica P. highly recommends Sonya Smallets for any employment issues. She was honest and sincere and cared about her situation of unlawful termination.
testimonalData.author: Veronica P.
